articles.title: Milan’s Christmas tree ignites Olympic hopes
articles.description: Milan’s 29-metre Christmas tree has become the centre of a month-long winter wonderland celebrating Milano Cortina 2026, with TCL blending light, technology and Olympic values to inspire visitors through immersive igloos, athlete stories and sustainable design.
articles.content:
A festive countdown to Milano Cortina 2026: how TCL’s support is putting Milan’s Christmas tree at the centre of a month-long celebration of Olympic dreams.
Thousands of spectators gathered in Milan’s Piazza del Duomo for the city’s annual tree-light... [7414 chars]

articles.title: Environment protection to entrepreneurship, EVs driving India’s ‘Next Growth Story’: Dr Jitendra
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent NEW DELHI, Dec 21: During his visit today to the Electric Vehicle (EV) Expo at Bharat Mandapam here, Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology, Earth Sciences and Minister of State in the PMO, Personnel, Public Grievances, Pensions, Atomic Energy and Space, Dr Jitendra Singh observed that from environment protection to employment creation, EVs are driving India’s “Next Growth Story”. The Minister also interacted with exhibitors and reviewed a wide range of electric mobility solutions […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
NEW DELHI, Dec 21: During his visit today to the Electric Vehicle (EV) Expo at Bharat Mandapam here, Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology, Earth Sciences and Minister of State in the PMO, Perso... [3246 chars]

articles.title: Ram temple movement succeeded as message resonated in every heart: Sadhvi Ritambhara
articles.description: THANE, Dec 21 : Religious leader Sadhvi Ritambhara on Sunday said the Ayodhya Ram temple movement succeeded despite the absence of social media or modern information technology because the message resonated authentically in every heart. The struggle over the Ram Janmabhoomi issue was the culmination of a “resolution without an alternative”. “Our work is for Ram ji’s work,” she said, adding that the temple’s construction stands as a testament to what a determined, unified community can achieve. Addressing an event […]
articles.content:
THANE, Dec 21 : Religious leader Sadhvi Ritambhara on Sunday said the Ayodhya Ram temple movement succeeded despite the absence of social media or modern information technology because the message resonated authentically in every heart.
The struggle ... [636 chars]

articles.title: Ensuring selection process is transparent and merit-based top priority , says new UPESSC chairman Prashant Kumar
articles.description: UPESSC chairman Prashant Kumar prioritizes transparent, merit-based recruitment processes, enhancing technology for timely selections and fair opportunities.
articles.content: The newly appointed chairman of the Uttar Pradesh Education Service Selection Commission (UPESSC) Prashant Kumar on Sunday (December 21, 2025) said that his top priority is to ensure that the selection process is completely transparent and merit-base... [1614 chars]

articles.title: RWA Tokenization Is Already Disrupting Finance in 2026: Crypto Exec
articles.description: Tokenizing real-world assets on blockchain will disrupt the financial industry in a profound way, similar to how digital technology disrupted analog media.
articles.content: Tokenization will transform the financial industry faster than digital technology disrupted legacy media, such as print newspapers, physical copies of music and other analog formats, according to Keith Grossman, president of crypto payments company M... [2243 chars]

articles.description: White House AI czar David Sacks says AI is driving U.S. hiring and wage growth, challenging claims it threatens American jobs. Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy reveals Trump administration plan to launch U.S. air taxi operations and expand urban mobility.
articles.content: White House AI and Crypto Czar David Sacks has rejected the narrative that artificial intelligence is a threat to the American workforce, citing new data from Vanguard that suggests the technology is currently a significant driver of hiring and wage ... [6489 chars]

articles.title: Value fashion chains double store count in five years as Zudio, Yousta, Style Up lead expansion
articles.description: Discount-led retail chains have significantly expanded their store presence, adding approximately 2,500 outlets in the last five years. This growth is driven by major Indian conglomerates targeting price-conscious consumers with aggressive expansion strategies, particularly in smaller towns. While the value retail segment thrives, retailers must now focus on governance and technology alongside expansion as the market becomes more disciplined.
articles.content:
Synopsis
Discount-led retail chains have significantly expanded their store presence, adding approximately 2,500 outlets in the last five years. This growth is driven by major Indian conglomerates targeting price-conscious consumers with aggressive e... [3051 chars]
